name: Lemon Blueberry Multi Grain Muffins. Vegan.
description: Lemon Blueberry Multigrain Muffins. A delicious and healthy breakfast or snack. Vegan Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 2/3 cup self rising flour (or all purpose flour + 1/4 teaspoon baking powder)
1.5 tablespoon high fat oil ((I used organic canola))
1.5 tablespoon roasted Cashew butter ((I used store bought,Homemade nut butter recipes))
5 tablespoons raw granulated sugar or equivalent jaggery or other sweetener. (a couple of tbsps more for a sweeter muffin)

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, add flax meal, lemon juice, sugar, oil, cashew butter and 1/4 cup (60ml) almost hot water.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl, add flax meal, lemon juice, sugar, oil, cashew butter and 1/4 cup (60ml) almost hot water.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix it well till the mixture is well combined and a little light. Add in the oats, 1/4 cup (60ml) more water, cooked quinoa(optional, I am on quinoa roll), lemon zest, mix well and keep aside for a few minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix it well till the mixture is well combined and a little light. Add in the oats, 1/4 cup (60ml) more water, cooked quinoa(optional, I am on quinoa roll), lemon zest, mix well and keep aside for a few minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, mix the flours, salt, baking powder.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl, mix the flours, salt, baking powder.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the wet mixture and mix for only a few strokes. If the mixture stays too stiff, add more water. do not overmix.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the wet mixture and mix for only a few strokes. If the mixture stays too stiff, add more water. do not overmix.

recipeInstructions.text: Take 2 Tablespoons of batter. Add 2 Tablespoons oats, coarsely ground Oats, 1 teaspoon of oil , 1 teaspoon raw sugar and 1 tablespoon self rising flour, Mix and keep this for crumble on top. The crumble is optional.
recipeInstructions.name: Take 2 Tablespoons of batter. Add 2 Tablespoons oats, coarsely ground Oats, 1 teaspoon of oil , 1 teaspoon raw sugar and 1 tablespoon self rising flour, Mix and keep this for crumble on top. The crumble is optional.

recipeInstructions.text: Drop batter in greased muffin pan or muffin cups.
recipeInstructions.name: Drop batter in greased muffin pan or muffin cups.

recipeInstructions.text: Drop 4-5 blueberries on top and drop some of the crumble.
recipeInstructions.name: Drop 4-5 blueberries on top and drop some of the crumble.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake in preheated oven at 350 degrees F for 20-25 minutes, until toothpick inserted comes out clean.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake in preheated oven at 350 degrees F for 20-25 minutes, until toothpick inserted comes out clean.

recipeInstructions.text: Let muffins sit for 5 minutes, then take them out and let cool on wire rack. Store in a cool dry box for 2-3 days.
recipeInstructions.name: Let muffins sit for 5 minutes, then take them out and let cool on wire rack. Store in a cool dry box for 2-3 days.

keywords: breakfast muffin, fruit muffin, healthy breakfast
